native_name: <hr/> Република Молдовеняскэ Нистрянэ (ro) ++ !!{{resize | 95% | Republica Moldovenească Nistreană }}, <hr/> Приднестровская Молдавская Республика (ru) ++ !!{{resize | 95% | !!{{transl | ru | Pridnestrovskaja Moldavskaja Respublika}} }}, <hr/> Придністровська Молдавська Республіка (uk) ++ !!{{resize | 95% | !!{{transl | uk | Prydnistrovsĭka Moldavsĭka Respublika}} }}
status: Unrecognised state ++ Recognised by the United Nations as de jure part of Moldova
national_anthem: ++ Мы славим тебя, Приднестровье (ru) ++ My slavim tebja, Pridnestrovje !!{{nbsp | 2}} ( transliteration ) ++ We sing the praises of Transnistria ++ <center>‹File: Гимн Приднестровской Молдавской Республики (на трёх языках).ogg›</center>
established_event1: Independence from SSR of Moldova declared
established_event3: Succeeds the Pridnestrovian Moldavian Soviet Socialist Republic
footnote_a: Russian is the main official language.
footnote_b: The Romanian language written in Cyrillic script is officially called Moldovan in Transnistria.
footnote_c: Limited to the breakaway Republic of Abkhazia , Republic of Artsakh and South Ossetia (see Community for Democracy and Rights of Nations ).
footnote_d: Moldovan leu used in those areas under Moldovan control and in the security zone.
footnote_f: .md and .com are mostly used TLDs here, some companies use .ru as well.

[^2].title: On the situation of Russian schools in Moldova

[^3].title: Law of the Moldavian Soviet Socialist Republic on the Functioning of Languages on the Territory of the Moldavian SSR

[^4].title: Russian language in Moldova could lose their status (Русский язык в Молдове может потерять свой статус)

references.[^5]: The Supreme Soviet changed the official name of the republic from Pridnestrovian Moldavian Soviet Socialist Republic to Pridnestrovian Moldavian Republic on 5 November 1991. See: "Postanovlenie verkhovnogo soveta Pridnestrovskoi Moldavskoi Respubliki ob izmenenii nazvaniia respubliki," Dnestrovskaia pravda, 6 November 1991, 1.
references.[^6]: Populația Transnistriei a scăzut cu 14,3 la sută !!{{webarchive | url=https://web.archive.org/web/20170803130923/http://flux.md/stiri/social/populatia-transnistriei-scazut-cu-143-la-suta.html/ | date=3 August 2017}}
